entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10 except minus 16 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022
